Reviews.Title: It sucks!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Shonda Johnson
Reviews.Content: this tablet is a very bad and trying to return is a nightmare. It suck suck suck suck something bad

ProductInfo.Features:
Fast ARM Cortex-A9 VIA8850 1.5GHz CPU runs Android 4 stably and smoothly
Responsive multi-touch capacitive 1024*768 LCD screen,
Slim design with metal body, more strong & savety
8GB Internal Memory; microSD expansion up to 32GB, Build-in Wifi 802.11 b/g/n, Support external 10-100M Ethernet Access and 3G.
Dual Camera: Rear Camera 2.0 Mega Pixel. Front Camera 0.3 mega pixel.
ProductInfo.Name: Easydy 8inch HD Capacitive Touch screen Android 4.0 Dual Camera Tablet with ARM Cortex-A9 1500 MHz / 512MB DDR3 / 8G Flash Wifi HDMI
